item.description:
Sarah has wanted to get Snowboarding Lessons - OK Me too! So we're going to make it a Meetup

You can Ski or Snowboard.... You can get there whenever you like but I think the lessons start at 900. So we plan on getting there by 8 am.

No need to preregister but it might be a good idea to prepay on their website just in case.

We can meet in the rental area in the lodge at 8-830 and if that doesnt work. Lets plan on meeting at 1230 and 3 in the lodge.

Call or text my cell phone if we cannot find eachother 508-479-7690

It's $89 for the lesson and rental package. See the website for the rest

http://www.wachusett.com/
item.why: Sorry folks but I had to change the location for Saturdays event. I called today to confirm our lessons & despite my previous phone calls and the postings on their website, Blue Hills are not offering lessons this Saturday until late in the afternoon

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Ski & Snowboarding at WACHUSETT - KID FRIENDLY
